title: 111_s294
content: Extension and modification of special allowance for certain property acquired during 2009. Extension of special allowance for certain property acquired during 2009 under the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended to extend deadlines to January 1, 2011, and January 1, 2010. Amendments include changes to headings and clauses to reflect the new dates. Code is amended to change dates in subparagraphs and clauses related to special allowances for property acquired in 2009 under the Internal Revenue Code of 1986. The Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended to change dates for special allowances related to property acquired in 2009. The amendments apply to property placed in service after December 31, 2008, with a technical amendment applying to taxable years ending after March 31, 2008. The Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended to include films or videotapes as qualified property, with the original use commencing after December 31, 2008. The Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended to include films or videotapes as qualified property acquired by the taxpayer after December 31, 2008, and before January 1, 2010, or pursuant to a written binding contract entered into after December 31, 2008, and before January 1, 2010, and placed in service before January 1, 2010. The Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended to include films or videotapes as qualified property acquired by the taxpayer after December 31, 2008, and before January 1, 2010, or pursuant to a written binding contract entered into after December 31, 2008, and before January 1, 2010, and placed in service before January 1, 2010. Amendments are made to various sections of the Code to include property described in subparagraph (H) as one class of property for tax purposes. The amendments made by this subsection apply to property placed in service after December 31, 2008, with specific adjustments to clauses and effective dates. SEC. 2. Temporary increase in limitations on expensing of certain depreciable business assets for taxable years beginning after December 31, 2008.
